code: import React from'react';import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var getTime=function getTime(note){return new Date(note.updated).toLocaleDateString();};var getTitle=function getTitle(note){var title=note.body.split('\n')[0];if(title.length>45){return title.slice(0,45);}return title;};var getContent=function getContent(note){var title=getTitle(note);var content=note.body.replaceAll('\n',' ');content=content.replaceAll(title,'');if(content.length>45){return content.slice(0,45)+'...';}else{return content;}};var ListItem=function ListItem(_ref){var note=_ref.note;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/note/".concat(note.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notes-list-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:getTitle(note)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:getTime(note)}),getContent(note)]})]})});};export default ListItem;
